CustomField.formula: if( ISPICKVAL(LPCR_TypeCreche__c, 'MICRO'),'MICRO',if(ISPICKVAL(LPCR_TypeCreche__c, 'MAC'),'MAC',if ( OR (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Reservataire', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Reservataire_Approuve') , 'RES', if ( or(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Referencement', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Referencement_Approuve'), 'REF', NULL ) )))
CustomField.label: Type Quote
